Original:
金門街真的要崛起了！原本像這種金門街、晉江街屬於永久都市更新計畫不能的老舊小區，有了許多創新的文藝人士將原有的老屋轉換成各種創新餐飲、小館、咖啡、玩具店真的投入許多心力去經營。

小地方顧名思義就是利用很小的空間將其精緻化成為複合式小館，門口還有輛單座極簡風格塗裝的絕版速克達（三陽達可達）裝飾藝術。

在中午它可以是專賣焗烤類別的簡餐飲店，到了下午又成為寧靜文藝的咖啡館，到了晚上就搖身一變成各種Free style放飛自我小酒館！好比健達出奇蛋般的一次滿足你所有類別的需求，衷心希望這個疫情能夠安分讓這樣優質的店可以門庭若市。
EN:
Jinmen Street is really about to rise!Originally, such Jinmen Street and Jinjiang Street belong to the old communities that cannot be permanently updated. There are many innovative literary and artists convert the original old house into various innovative catering, small restaurants, coffee, toy shops. Invest in many efforts to operate.

As the name implies, small places use a small space to refine it into a composite small museum. At the door, there is a single -seater minimalist -style out -of -print Suchen Keda (Sanyang Da Keda) decoration art.

At noon, it can be a simple dining shop that specializes in baked barbecue. In the afternoon, it becomes a quiet literary cafe. At night, it will become a variety of Free STYLE to let the self -tavern!Just like Jianda's strange eggs to meet all the needs of your categories, and sincerely hope that this epidemic can make such high -quality stores in the city.

Original:
我真的推薦這個地方..！我想找一家可以喝金門高粱酒的酒吧，發現那裡氣氛很好，老闆英語說得很好，而且很喜歡香國，所以我們聊了很多事情，最後和一些常客聊了起來。在這裡你可以點威士忌或高粱酒，慢慢品味，與當地人進行有趣的交談。
我和我的朋友們與你們一起度過了難忘的時光。謝謝你所做的一切。希望再次見到您！
EN:
I really recommend this place ...!I want to find a bar that can drink Golden Gate Sorghum wine and find that the atmosphere there is good. The boss speaks well, and I like Xiangguo very much, so we talked a lot of things and finally talked to some frequent customers.Here you can order whiskey or sorghum wine, taste slowly, and talk interesting with the locals.
My friends and I spent my unforgettable time with you.Thank you for everything you have done.Hope to see you again!

Original:
這是一個古色古香的小地方，您可以安靜地喝一杯，並與迷人的當地人進行愉快的交談。
他們提供了我喜歡的台灣當地 IPA，以及 Orion 生啤酒。他們還在商店旁邊出售各種威士忌和烈酒。
顧名思義，它有點小，但比你想像的要寬敞一些。
EN:
This is a small place of antique. You can drink a drink quietly and talk happily with the charming locals.
They provide my favorite local IPA and Orion raw beer.They also sell various whiskey and spiritual wine next to the store.
As the name suggests, it is a bit small, but it is more spacious than you think.
